query.name: net.cdolinc.user.employment.employmentList
query.sql: SELECT u_cdol_user_employment.id, u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid, u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid, CASE WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = 0 THEN 'Diocean Office' WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = -1 THEN u_cdol_user_employment.school_name ELSE schools.name END AS schoolname, u_cdol_user_employment.assignment, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, FLOOR( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ) / 12 ) AS emp_years, FLOOR( MOD( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ), 12 ) ) AS emp_months, u_cdol_user_employment.epm_fte, u_cdol_user_employment.notes FROM u_cdol_user_employment LEFT JOIN schools ON schools.school_number = u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid WHERE u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0

query.name: net.cdolinc.user.employment.totalTime
query.description: Total Years and Months of Employment
query.sql: WITH max_record AS ( SELECT u_cdol_user_employment.id, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date FROM u_cdol_user_employment WHERE ( u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0 ) AND u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date = ( SELECT MAX(emp_start_date) FROM u_cdol_user_employment WHERE usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid ) ), min_record AS ( SELECT u_cdol_user_employment.id, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date FROM u_cdol_user_employment WHERE ( u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0 ) AND u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date = ( SELECT MIN(emp_start_date) FROM u_cdol_user_employment WHERE usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid ) ), max_dates AS ( SELECT NVL(max_record.emp_end_date, SYSDATE) AS max_end_date, min_record.emp_start_date AS min_start_date FROM max_record, min_record ) SELECT max_dates.max_end_date, max_dates.min_start_date, FLOOR( TRUNC( MONTHS_BETWEEN(max_dates.max_end_date, max_dates.min_start_date) / 12 ) ) AS total_years, FLOOR( MOD( MONTHS_BETWEEN(max_dates.max_end_date, max_dates.min_start_date), 12 ) ) AS total_months FROM max_dates
